data.thought: S14|H|S10|Reactive+Container Phenotype B4: 'A/B Experiment Runner'. On new feature flag event: spawns 2 containers (control + treatment). Each runs app variant, collects metrics. Thoughtbox analyzes statistical significance in real-time. Observable: side-by-side metrics, confidence intervals, reasoning about tradeoffs. Terminates experiment when significance reached. Use case: rapid product experimentation w/ AI-assisted interpretation.
